# matrixOS

## The original design concept
The system was designed to be used in projects that do not have too many preemptive events. The original design was originally designed to provide a convenient platform for college students to participate in various competitions and projects, providing some uniform interfaces and standards to create a more convenient Programming environment. So the system is based on the idea of design: 1. Reasonable abstraction, interface abstraction rather than call abstraction, try to make the program look simple and intuitive, expose important details to the programmer of the program instead of hiding it. However, the degree of packaging and clear design will greatly reduce the potential bugs of the program. 2. Concise and efficient, each function has been considered for its practicality and its easy to debug and portability, without adding too much fancy but useless features, before the performance bottleneck, not excessively Prematurely optimize the code for details. 3. Portability, this code is based on the stm32h743iit6 and punctual atomic SYSTEM platform, but the abstraction of the top-level design and the packaging mode and corresponding standards for the interface will make the system can be easily ported to major stm32 projects. In the file. 4. The development community is currently expected to have only one development community, and its main developers are from the Electronic Science and Technology Association of the School of Electronic Science and Engineering of the University of Electronic Science and Technology.

## Design ideas
The design of the system is based on a lot of online information, and reference to the freeRTOS system and UCOS system kernel and the scheduler design of the Linux system. Based on the idea of finite state machine, some design concepts of the above three systems are absorbed, and it is extracted into a lightweight system more suitable for college students to participate in various competitions. It is simple but equally efficient. The introduction of state machine thinking and data space ideas greatly reduces the complexity of the program. The system is a real-time, lightweight operating system based on finite state machine and time slice rotation scheduling.

## Original design intention
We hope that we can provide you with a unified template. There are definitely some places that are not considered enough or areas to be improved, so I hope that you can join in and make it more perfect.

## Abstract level design of the program
### Time slice rotation
In the routine, the TIM5 general-purpose timer is used (can be changed, and the priority is preferably set to a lower state). The timing level is ms level, about 10ms (there is a macro definition that can be used for configuration, this macro definition will be used as the entry parameter of the SYSTEM_timer_Init function, and it is agreed that the benchmark will not change during a single program) for a new round of time. The opening of the slice, the main function of this timer is to set a variable global_interpreter_flag (the name is taken from python's global interpreter lock) at the end of the timing. The main loop in the main function will continuously detect this flag, and only enter the event call when it is 1, and is responsible for clearing it after the event call ends. From a macro perspective, the program is cut into many equal-length ms-level time slices with low error.For example,
![image.png](data:image/png;base64,)
### Abstraction of processes, event functions, state machine based
In each time slice, each basic event is executed only once, and its next state is specified, and will enter the specified state in the next round of time slices. These events are unified into the corresponding event function. The event function is located in the .c and .h files of the corresponding module. The naming rule is "the lowercase identifier of the void event name_event(local_state_space *the uppercase identifier of the event name_state)" .
### State design
There are many possible values for its state, and I organize it with an enumerated type. As shown

![avatar](data:image/png;base64,)
sleep_state,turn on the reading, wake up after a number of time slices, or wait for the external signal to wake up, that is, the state can only be changed from the external state to the ready state in the sleep state, or the state is automatically replaced with another state after the reading is read.
prepare_state,Ready state. In this state, the external signal is detected to determine whether it enters the running state. If it is not running, it will return directly. If it is, the initial configuration of the related resources required for running needs to be performed. The state should be the first entry of the event according to the agreement.
run_state,Running state, it should be noted that you need to specify time or permanent sleep.  
dead_state,The thread is deadlocked after entering this mode, and an error signal should be sent in the deadlock state.  
At the end of each state, the environment required for the next state should be configured.? 
This enum type is defined in the systimer.h file.
### Design of local data space of state machine
Referring to the design of Python's class, in order to aggregate data and operations, each event has its own dedicated structure, which stores the state data (enumeration type state) required by the event and some The operational data used, the structure should be defined above the main function while loop. And initialize the structure body state variable to prepare_state. And its pointer should be passed to the event function in the loop. This structure type is defined in the systimer.h file. The structure contains: 1. An indication of the next state of the state. 2. If the state enters the sleep time variable of the sleep state, the next state after the sleep ends. 3. An array of pointers is used to point to the first address of the desired data. 4. An array of integers to hold some small pieces of scattered data. (Note: The address of the local variable in the event function cannot be stored in the pointer array, and must be declared as a static variable before being stored)
### Global data space design
Processes often need to communicate, exchange data, such as button presses, button events send a signal, another event detects this signal, and detect the relevant reaction, so the global variable space structure is designed for this purpose, The structure is declared in the systimer.h file and is defined and initialized in the main.c file and marked by the extern keyword in systimer.h. This ensures that all systimer.h-capable files can call the struct variable (declared in the main.c file). (In fact, systimer.h should be included in every basic module and should be included in main.c.) The structure contains: 1.global_interpreter_flag variable. 2. Two levels of interactive flags. 3. Four small data of different lengths are stored in an array, that is, a cache. 4. A very long pointer array, global_data_address, is used to point to related data.

## Secondary development principles
### Interface rigor
The size and composition of all function name variable names should be fully synchronized with the routine.
The biggest meaning of the flag bit is that after the sender prepares the data to be processed, the sender is informed to let him perform some state to process the data. The party that agrees to generate the flag does not explicitly clear the flag bit, and only the receiver can receive it.
Clear the flag bit, clear and set to 0, which can significantly reduce the packet loss rate.
### Performance Analysis
Can adapt to most of the time at the ms level of the task, for some time in the basic tasks of us, there are two processing principles: 1. Integrate them into a package into a state, the situation is adapted to this situation: the event will be individual The time period is accessed in very frequent times. 2. Add an emergency interrupt handling mechanism, which is packaged as an interrupt event that is free of time off-chip. For some tasks that are too long, take a split strategy and cut it into multiple ms-level time periods, and gradually complete all tasks by means of state flow. And the ms level software delay, which is greater than the time slice, or the cyclic delay should be completely discarded, by means of the sleep_state state. The error is within the length of the time slice/2. If the delay is short, the software delay can be directly. If the delay is long, the error of the ms level is not too big. You can add a correction state to erase the effect. . Each event function should release the occupation of cpu resources at the appropriate time and deploy the operating environment of the next state. This can greatly increase the operating efficiency and improve the utilization of the CPU.
### Maximum transmission efficiency analysis
Based on the time slice flow, when the data receiver response speed should be greater than the sender, that is, when the time slice rotation frequency is greater than the generator. The slowest transmission delay is about the length of one time slice, the fastest transmission time is less than the length of one time slice, and the average time is 1/4 time slice, depending on the order in which the events are stored. (There are some rigorous mathematical derivations that have not yet been entered)

## Specific migration steps and related conventions
All module files should contain the systimer.h file so that the global variable global_data and the enumerated type state and local data space structures can be called inside the file.
The module file should encapsulate one or more event functions, and take the local data space structure pointer as the entry parameter, and organize it with an if else structure inside the event function (using the case), and the judgment should jump to What state. The specific implementation can see the routine code, including sleep entry, deadlock state processing, etc., can find the latest updates and examples in the master branch.
The main.c file should call the systimer.h file and initialize the global data space, especially to initialize the global interpreter variable to 0.
Place the statement according to the comments given in main.c.
Note the specification of capitalization.
